name: chainskills
description: _Project goal:_  —Åhoose a new director by the method of voting of all employees. ### Working principle: To work with this project, you need a MetaMask extension for browsers. Assume that we have a firm in which there are, for example, n employees. Let k employees nominated their candidacy to become the director (1 < k < n). Of these, we have to choose a director. If you want to see all the events that will be done next, click on the __"Events"__ button.
author: ChainSkills
